about_the_game:
"The Divide" Is a tactical turn-based strategy game, with deckbuilding elements, set in a divided land, fight for your king, and unite the kingdom!

  • THINK - Inspired by XCOM and the likes, we thrive to make a intersting game that is tough, and will make you think about each combat differently.
  • BUILD YOUR DECK - A huge selection of cards to to choose from, build your own deck, and have fun experimenting with different card combos to make your enemies bow down!
  • UNIQUE HEROES - Each hero is unique, meaning once you find a hero, you need to keep him safe! death is permanent, and a hero deaths will make sure to keep you on your toes.

content_descriptors.notes: The game includes violence/gore in combat scenarios.
